text: Anna noticed a book on her shelf that had never been there before, its cover shimmering like a cloud.
scene: Anna reaching for a cloud-textured book on her shelf, afternoon light in her room

text: When she opened it, a staircase of pages unfolded, leading upward into the sky.
scene: paper staircase rising from the open book toward a skylight, Anna looking up amazed

text: She climbed into a library made of soft clouds, shelves floating gently around her.
scene: Anna standing in a cloud library with floating book stacks, blue sky all around

text: A librarian made of swirling letters greeted her. "Our winds have scattered the stories. Can you gather them?"
scene: friendly librarian figure composed of letters speaking to Anna among cloud shelves

text: Wisps of torn pages drifted by. Anna caught them with a butterfly net shaped like a bookmark.
scene: Anna sweeping a bookmark-shaped net to catch floating page pieces among clouds

text: She pieced them together on a table of sunlight, forming the tale of a brave cloud whale.
scene: Anna reassembling pages on a glowing table, image of a cloud whale visible on the pages

text: The whale story glowed and turned into a small cloud whale that swam around the shelves.
scene: tiny cloud whale swimming through the library, leaving a sparkling trail

text: Next, she found scattered poems that smelled like rain. She placed them into empty spine slots.
scene: Anna sliding rain-scented pages into book spines on a floating shelf

text: Each finished poem became a raindrop that rang like a bell when it hit the floor of clouds.
scene: raindrop-shaped notes falling gently and chiming on cloud floor, Anna smiling

text: High above, a gust had blown books into a maze of wind tunnels.
scene: books spinning gently inside spiral wind tunnels above the library, Anna looking up

text: Anna used a ribbon of bookmarks to guide herself through the tunnels, collecting books as she went.
scene: Anna holding onto a long ribbon of bookmarks, floating through windy passages grabbing books

text: At the center, a giant atlas had lost its compass rose. She drew one with a quill dipped in sunlight.
scene: Anna drawing a glowing compass rose on a huge atlas page, quill shining

text: The atlas settled, and maps unfolded, showing safe routes for every drifting story.
scene: maps floating around Anna, aligning themselves, soft light guiding them

text: The letter librarian offered her a pair of cloud glasses. "These help you see missing words," it said.
scene: librarian handing Anna small glasses made of mist, letters swirling inside the lenses

text: With the glasses on, she spotted a faint trail of letters leading to a hidden nook.
scene: Anna wearing cloud glasses, seeing glowing letters leading behind a shelf

text: In the nook, a shy book hid under a blanket of fog. Anna lifted it gently.
scene: Anna uncovering a small book hidden under fog, cozy corner of the library

text: It contained bedtime stories for tired stars. She read one aloud, and the fog cleared.
scene: Anna reading from the book, fog lifting, tiny star lights appearing to listen

text: The library brightened. Books hummed softly, stories settled back into their places.
scene: floating shelves glowing warmly, books returning to order, Anna in the middle

text: The librarian gave her a bookmark shaped like a feather. "Come back anytime the sky feels quiet," it said.
scene: librarian handing Anna a feather-shaped bookmark, clouds drifting lazily around

text: Anna climbed down the page staircase. In her room, the feather bookmark shimmered, and a tiny cloud whale floated above her bed.
scene: Anna back in her room with the glowing feather bookmark, a small cloud whale drifting over her bed
